  • Method Details

    • canEat

      public boolean canEat​(Eatable food)
      This method is to check whether the food is eatable for pterodactyls. In this case, only fish and corpse are eatable.
      Specified by:
      canEat in class Dinosaur
      Parameters:
      food -
      Returns:
      boolean depends on whether the food is eatable

    • getEatAction

      public DinosaurAction getEatAction​(Location location)
      This method is to create a new eat action when the food in the location is eatable for pterodactyls.
      Specified by:
      getEatAction in class Dinosaur
      Parameters:
      location - of the pterodactyls
      Returns:
      a new EatAction(foodList) if condition is met, null if location not valid or food is not eatable.

      Description copied from class: Dinosaur

      display - the I/O object to which messages may be written
